sentence: In 1994, Johnson founded Perry Johnson Registrars, a Troy-based company that audits and certifies other firms as meeting international standards for quality management systems.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

sentence: The challenges against former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon and Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson could threaten their candidacies if successful.
author: Clara Hendrickson
title: Michigan GOP candidates hoping to unseat Whitmer face challenges to nominating petitions

sentence: Challenges have also been filed to the nominating petitions of Dixon, of Norton Shores, and Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson.
author: Paul Egan
title: James Craig acknowledges possible fraud in signature gathering for his petition
